description: Mobile techniques used by ShiftyBug, ATT&CK software S0294 v1.1
name: ShiftyBug (S0294)

techniques.comment: [ShiftyBug](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0294) is packed with at least eight publicly available exploits that can perform rooting.(Citation: Lookout-Adware)
[ShiftyBug](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0294) is auto-rooting adware that embeds itself as a system application, making it nearly impossible to remove.(Citation: Lookout-Adware)
